product_name: Merrell All Out Blaze Low Waterproof Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: Spend the day exploring your favorite trail with the women's Merrell All Out Blaze Low Waterproof Hiking Shoes. They allow natural motion and absorb impacts to keep your feet comfortable. Waterproof, seam-sealed construction offers a high level of breathability. Breathable mesh linings are treated with M-Select FRESH natural enzymes to help prevent odors. Lacing system provides a precise, glovelike fit. Bellowed tongues keep debris out. Merrell AllOut Blaze Low Waterproof Hiking Boots have Vibram(R) outsoles with 6mm-deep lugs for excellent traction on the trail.
short_description: Spend the day exploring your favorite trail with the women's Merrell All Out Blaze Low Waterproof Hiking Shoes. They allow natural motion and absorb impacts to keep your feet comfortable.
